price: Mûsâ dedi ki: “Ey Firavun! Şüphesiz ki ben âlemlerin Rabbi tarafından gönderilmiş bir peygamberim.”
arabic: وَقَالَ مُوسَىٰ يَٰفِرۡعَوۡنُ إِنِّي رَسُولٞ مِّن رَّبِّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: waqāla mūsā yāfir'ʿawnu innī rasūlun min rabbi al-ʿālamīna
